metadata.title: USGS CMG G-1-97-BS - Alaskan Biologic Habitats
metadata.description:
Sidescan-sonar data collected in 3 areas (EXP1, BB, and COD), and video  collected in 2 areas (EXP1 and BB). Robert McConnaughey directed the collection  of numerous sediment samples for examination by National Marine Fisheries  Service biologists. 
Notes G197BS This was a cooperative cruise with NMFS. The USGS has the sidescan  data and video, NMFS has the sediment samples.  Maps of surface morphology derived from sidescan mosaics. 
Area of Operation : Bristol Bay, Bering Sea, Alaska
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Identify and document seafloor disruption due to trawling for fish.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned
